name: 🍋 Failed Series Pitch (more finds from BIG MEAT STUDIO 97) 🍋
name_original: 🍋 Failed Series Pitch (more finds from BIG MEAT STUDIO 97) 🍋
description: After The Year 2000 megahit, The Watcher was released, there was a plan to create an animated series. The only studio dumb enough to attempt this was NONE OTHER THAN Big Meat! After a rough short was created, it was torn to shreds by the executives and screen audience. "TOO RAUNCHY!" they said! the short was known to be the worst thing ever produced by a large studio. all the cels were burned and tossed away to remove an evidence it existed....OR SO WE THOUGHT-
